bio:
I am a Microsoft Certified senior software developer with extensive experience working as a professional freelancer and prior to that working for a Fortune 10 company's IT department. 

I offer premium website and web/mobile application development for startups (MVPs), small to medium size businesses, and enterprise clients. I focus on C#, .NET, and JaveScript based frameworks like Angular, React, etc. I am easy to work with and very reliable, and I have the knowledge and drive necessary to complete a wide variety of complex projects.

I have extensive experience with numerous technologies and skills (C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET, JavaScript, Angular, React/React Native, Node.js, Razor Pages, Umbraco, Kentico CMS, jQuery, Bootstrap, VBScript, Microsoft SQL Server, etc.). Experience with SendGrid, Stripe, and cryptocurrency API's (Coinbase, Binance, Poloniex & GDAX). I have also developed numerous desktop applications (C#/VB.NET/Java) that are connected to a centralized DB and/or the cloud (i.e. Azure, AWS, Custom built RESTful API's, OAuth authentication, etc.) along with Windows Packaging/Installer software. 

As a result-oriented software architect with a "big picture" vision, I’m able to work both in a team and independently and I have great leadership skills too.

Authorized to work in the U.S. for any employer.

I can:
- Work 8+ hrs per day and 40+ hrs per week.
- Be available to work on weekends if it is needed.
- Do a daily or weekly update regarding the work requirement.
- Be available to cooperate on Slack, Skype, Teams, Discord, Basecamp, or wherever you prefer.
- Open an Hourly Contract, and it is negotiable for the long-term contracts

bio:
My name is Yao and I'm a passionate, experienced, entrepreneurial, hands-on professional with 10+ years of experience as a full-stack developer so that looking to cooperate with clients and companies to build strong and long relationships that can both grow each other. I always like to make suggestions that will help the project move as efficiently as possible, because I want my clients to become 100% satisfied with the end result and the time it took to get there.

I'm a fast learner, keeping up to date as new tools emerge in the rapidly evolving programming. I'm a hard worker so that with 10+ years of experience developing websites and web applications for companies in a wide range of programming, 

I have the ability to see projects through to completion and propose creative solutions that match customer needs. I love solving problems and tackling new issues, always striving to find the most efficient solutions.

Talking about technical skills, I primarily work with the following development stack:

✅Backend skills:
 - Node.js (ES6+, Express.js, Koa.js, Adonis.js, Hapi.js)
 - ASP.NET Core web API (C#, Entity Framework Core, .NET Core, IIS)
 - Spring Boot web API (Kotlin)
 - Golang
 - Python (Django, Flask)
 - Socket.IO
 - Mongoose, Sequelize.js
 - PHP (Laravel, Codeigniter)
 - AWS Lamda, Firebase funtions, Azure funtions

✅Frontend skills:
 - React.js, React Hooks, Context API, React-Redux, Redux-Saga
 - Angular 2+, TypeScript, RxJS
 - Vue, Jquery
 - Strong HTML, CSS, SCSS, LESS
 - BootStrap, Material UI, DevExpress UI, and other 3rd Party UI components.

✅Database skills:
 - Relational: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server
 - NoSQL: MongoDB, Redis, firestore
 
✅DevOps skills:
 - Unit Testing: Jest, Jasmine
 - Source Control & CI/CD: Git, GitHub/GitLab/BitBucket, Kubernetes, Docker, CircleCI, Travis CI
 - Deployment: AWS, GCP, Heroku, Digital Ocean

Always welcome to work with professionals and grow together all over the world!

Work hours and day
    Every day 12 hours from Monday to Friday.
    Weekends if required.

Communication
    Phone, Skype, Email, etc.

Prefer hourly ($30~$50) but that doesn't mean excludes fixed-job.

I can work at any timezone as a full-time freelancer and mostly used Skype and Slack for team communication.

Ali

beksConsulting was founded in 2005 with a vision of providing professional IT services to small companies and individuals seeking top-shelf talent without incurring the ever-rising cost of full-time staff.

Project fee structure:
I prefer time-based projects, but I will accept fixed-cost projects when project requirements are well defined. I also accept fixed-cost projects for new clients while we are establishing a trust relationship.

Payment terms:
I invoice monthly via Guru with the expectation of Net 15 terms. For time-based projects, I provide line item breakdown of hours worked with the invoice.

abstrac: Best Website Development and Web Application Company located in New Delhi and in the United States
bio:
Amazon Softwares provides web design, web development and mobile application development services ranging from simple e-commerce solutions to mobile apps, complex web applications for every kind of business need for all industries.

We uphold transparency and integrity in client relationships. And regardless of whether you are new to this business or have created many websites/applications before, you will be provided with our care and clearly defined approach throughout the entire process. 

We are not just another outsourcing provider. While thinking about the business, we still believe in a better world. We build a relationship with our clients and partners based on a truth and honesty. We will not try to sell you our services if we feel like they are useless for you. We will try to help you only where and when you really need it. And our happy customers prove that! So why not to join them ?

For every project we follow 4-point development methodology: 

1) Define: We discuss customer needs and determine the scope of the project. We consult with you regarding your goals and provide any needed guidance. 

2) Design: Using wireframes and UI prototypes we bring visual clarity to your ideas. 

3) Develop: We follow a phased, agile-like development process which involves you the customer as much as possible so you always know the status of your project. 

4) Deploy: We offer server deployment, maintenance services, and full integration with your current systems. We ensure your end goal is met, and successfully implemented, on time and within budget. 

Industries We Serve:

- Real Estate
- Healthcare
- eCommerce
- Social Networking
- Travel and Hospitality
- Media and Entertainment
- Education and eLearning
- Many more

Technology Expertise:

Open Source

Codeignitor
CMS
Magento
BigCommerce
Cake PHP
OS Commerce
Drupal
Laravel
Joomla
Zend
shopify
Moodle
Opencart
wooCommerce
WordPress

Mobile

Android (Phone, Tablet, Android TV)
iOS / Apple (iPhone, iPad, Apple TV)

Availability: 24x7

Payment terms: NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS 
On Mutual Agreements, only through Guru Safepay only on milestone delivery or hourly payments as mutually agreed. 

Communication channels: 
Email, Direct US Numbers, Skype, Hangouts, Whatsapp, etc.

abstrac: Highly skilled, ambitious developer mostly specialized in ES6+, Typescript and PHP
bio:
Hello everyone,

I am a dedicated, hard-working developer with extensive knowledge and experience, 
strongly aspiring to motivate my career growth with great partners.
I like to architect applications with a scalable, robust structure, write organized, maintainable code
And when it comes to team collaboration, I would be always open to new ideas and willing to learn from other developers and help them.
I value firm long-term relationship and that's one of the secrets of how I have been able to work with clients for years.

Skill sets:
- Comfortable with Object-Oriented, Functional programming paradigm
- Expert in Node.js and PHP backend experience for microservice, real-time applications, IO intensive applications
 (Express, Restify, Laravel, Symfony, Yii2, CodeIgniter4)
- Most of javascript frameworks with solid Typescript background - Angular (4 years), React (3+ years), Vue (2 year)
   (Redux, Thunk, Saga, NgXS, Vuex, Nuxt.js, Next.js, GatsbyJS, Jest, Enzyme, Storybook, etc)
- Node.js, PHP, .Net Core, Python backend for GraphQL, RESTful API, services
- Solid DB experience  (Postgresql, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Realm, SQL, Sequelize, Knex, Objection.js, TypeORM, Mongoose)
- Backend techniques  (RabbitMQ, Messaging (MQTT), Queuing, Distributed computing)
- Cloud experiences and knowledge (AWS EC2, Lamda, S3, CloudFormation, Firebase)
- DevOps experience  (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform)
- Strong background in most of web standards (OAuth, JWT, SSL, SSO, CORS, RESTful

- 8+ hrs per day and 6 days per week. Open to any offer.
- Can work on any timezone
- Individual or Team work
- Daily or weekly updates.
- Available to cooperate on Slack, Skype, Telegram or anything you prefer.

abstrac: I help small biz owners and starts with all my passion & effort and the rest of all.
bio:
I am savvy web developer with 8+ years experiences in web development especially 5+ years in Ruby on Rails. Since 2007 I have developed a lot of senior level applications using primarily Ruby on Rails including e-commerce sites, inventory management systems, scheduling systems, forum applications and other fulfillment systems. I have deep knowledge background in HTML5, CSS(twitter bootstrap 2.x, 3.0, zurb foundation), Javascript(jQuery, angularjs, reactjs, d3js) and I have enough experience of working in leading and managing the web applications.

I started my developer career about 10 years ago, with C/C++ development. I built several applications with C/C++, .NET framework and investigated 3D technologies with DirectX & OpenGL. I built navigation program with DirectX with Google 3D datas and textures.
Also work on PHP, Javascript and Front-end jobs.
Python(Django,  script automation, web2py) skill is big plus of me
prefer hourly ($25~$40) but that doesn't mean excludes fixed job.

abstrac: Your Trusted IT Partner for custom application development.
bio:
Treta Infotech is a custom software development and IT Consulting company that provides services to enterprises across the globe. We customize and implement solutions that are based on cloud platform like Azure, AWS and Google. Our core strength is custom application development and custom API integration using cloud platform as a service.

Our core expertise:
Microsoft Azure
SharePoint 2013
SharePoint 2016
SharePoint Online
ASP.NET MVC
ASP.NET Core MVC
Mobile Application Development

API Integration and Development:
Microsoft Graph API SmartSheet, EtravelSmart, Euronet, SendGrid, Twilio, SenseNet OData REST API

Client Side Development:  
AngularJS, ReactJS, jQuery, SignalR

Worked with clients from:
Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Germany, USA, UK, India

Please visit our website: www.tretainfotech.com for more information and inquiry.

We have worked out flexible engagement models based on our experience working with clients from various regions.

HIRE TEAM ON MONTHLY BASIS:
This is one of the cost effective option for the clients who would like to develop product or solution where they need services like Project Management, Quality Assurance, Design and Development for the longer period of time. We provide end-to-end IT support for each phase of development. 

TIME AND MATERIAL
This model is suitable for the clients who would like to engage a developer or team of developers to maintain and/or extend the product or solution which is already developed. We provide expert developer who review the solution an make the suggested changes.  

FIX COST:
This option is suitable for the clients who wants to complete fix set of functionality within the scope, time and cost. We understand the complete scope of work, do analysis and provide you the time and cost estimation. You need to pay for the define milestones.

Please contact us for best suitable option.

abstrac: Website & Mobile App Development, Audio & Image processing, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, NLP, OCR, LPR, Face Recognition, RestAPI, Algorithm & Data Structure, React, NodeJs
bio:
Ting is a freelance developer with 10+ years of experience helping a broad range of clients develop and refine their projects.

- Website Design & Backend Development with Laravel, CodeIgniter, Nodejs, Django, WordPress;  CorePHP, React.js, Vue.js, AngularJS, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap4, CSS3, HTML5.
  
- Android / iOS app development with java, objective c, swift, React Native.

- Core technique on audio processing & image processing.
  Significant achievement on offline NLP engines with the help of deep learning.

- Object Detection and Image Recognition, Image Segmentation with various DNN models such as YOLO, Fast R-CNN, Mask R-CNN, Google Inception V3, Resnet, Alexnet, Vgg16...
  Much experience in ALPR, OCR, Lane Detection, Road Segmentation, Face Recognition.

- Good at mathematics, algorithm & data structure programming languages, as having ICPC career.

I am a full time developer.
